post.body: do you know how many cups is in a 10 oz box of confectioners sugar for @dcrmom?
no... trying to think it through, but it's difficult to say. 10 oz. for conf. sugar is weight and cups are volume.
you might check with @netshopper
Um... then what? Have bored kids driving me nuts with nothing to direct them to? No thanks. And what would i play with? ;)
fyi - I'm spreading the word... to friends on facebook. :)
Oh aren't you the funny one. :-|
Sorry. My only holiday blooper I think is not taking enough pictures. We failed to take a family pic yesterday w/my family
Nope. Would it make my hair dryers last longer than a couple of months? Maybe I should try it.
I saw some OH so SASSY ones at Inkstop if you have one near you.
We did it over a long weekend and were doing pretty well with # 1 by the end of it... # 2 has been a different story.
PT'ing in a day... mostly yet, but not in one day for us... either time. By day 3 both pretty much had it down.
Hubs & I realized yesterday that 13th anniv is next wk. We have no idea what to do. Suggestions?
RT: jenonearth New Vintage Inspired Earrings: http://tinyurl.com/558rma ... check them out. SUPER cute!
Working a little today. Daughter is with me. Paying her $.03 per sheet to staple together some marketing info. She's earning money for camp.
Now going to play wii with hubs. night y'all.
Praying for @MckMama & her mcmuffin.
I'm making cheesecake!!!
RT: @Foodimentary Today is The feast of John the Apostle, patron saint of authors, publishers and editors. @triciagoyer & @trishberg
My man is taking my princess on a movie date to see Bolt. Then, they're going to Costco for me. Son is hopefully resting & still not well.
Living in tornado alley and after a morning like we had, it warms my heart that @weatherwatches is out there. Thanks for the follow!
